## Description
Káº¿t ná»‘i vá»›i ngÃ¢n hÃ ng qua Plaid API Ä‘á»ƒ tá»± Ä‘á»™ng sync transactions.

## Features
### Phase 1: Setup
- [ ] Plaid account setup and API configuration
- [ ] Development environment testing (Sandbox mode)
- [ ] Link Token generation endpoint
- [ ] Public token exchange flow
- [ ] Access token secure storage

### Phase 2: UI/UX
- [ ] Plaid Link integration in app
- [ ] Bank account selection flow
- [ ] Connection status management
- [ ] Multi-bank support

### Phase 3: Transaction Sync
- [ ] Initial transaction import (24-month history)
- [ ] Incremental sync (daily/webhook-based)
- [ ] Transaction deduplication logic
- [ ] Category mapping from Plaid to Bexly

### Phase 4: Production
- [ ] Privacy Policy published
- [ ] Terms of Service published
- [ ] Consent flow implemented
- [ ] Data deletion functionality
- [ ] Plaid Production application submitted

## Technical
- `plaid_flutter` package
- Firebase Cloud Functions for token exchange
- Flutter Secure Storage for token management
- Plaid webhook handler

## Products
- Transactions ($0.30/account/month)
- Balance ($0.10/account/month)
- Recurring Transactions ($0.15/account/month) - Phase 2

## Timeline
6 weeks total

Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" issue create -R BexlyApp/Bexly --title "feat: RevenueCat Subscription Integration" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Description
TÃ­ch há»£p RevenueCat Ä‘á»ƒ quáº£n lÃ½ subscription vÃ  monetization.

## Pricing Tiers
| Tier | Price | Features |
|------|-------|----------|
| Free | $0 | 2 wallets, 2 budgets, 30 AI msgs/month, Google Drive backup |
| Premium | $2.99/mo | Unlimited wallets, 50 AI msgs, Firebase sync, 1GB receipt storage |
| Pro | $5.99/mo | Unlimited AI, all history, unlimited storage, priority support |

## Features
### Phase 1: RevenueCat Setup
- [ ] RevenueCat account setup
- [ ] Create products in App Store Connect & Google Play Console
- [ ] Implement paywall UI
- [ ] Handle subscription states (active, expired, grace period)

### Phase 2: Feature Gating
- [ ] Create `SubscriptionService` to check user tier
- [ ] Gate features based on subscription:
  - Wallet count limit
  - AI message counter (reset monthly)
  - Analytics date range
  - Storage quota check
- [ ] Show upgrade prompts when limits reached

### Phase 3: Google Drive Backup (Free tier)
- [ ] Integrate `googleapis` package
- [ ] Request Google Drive scope during auth
- [ ] Implement weekly auto-backup with WorkManager
- [ ] Export all data to JSON â†’ Upload to Drive

### Phase 4: Usage Tracking
- [ ] Track AI message usage per month
- [ ] Track storage usage for receipts
- [ ] Show usage in Settings screen
- [ ] Reset counters on subscription renewal

## Technical
- `purchases_flutter` (RevenueCat SDK)
- `googleapis` for Google Drive
- SharedPreferences for usage tracking

## Timeline
4 weeks

## Description
Read push notifications from banking apps to automatically create transactions.

## Features
- [ ] NotificationListenerService permission request
- [ ] Banking app package whitelist (`com.vietcombank.banking`, etc.)
- [ ] Filter notification by package name
- [ ] AI parse notification content
- [ ] Merge with SMS transactions (dedup)
- [ ] Support e-wallet notifications (Momo, ZaloPay)

## Technical
- `flutter_notification_listener` package
- Extract notification text
- AI parse â†’ transaction data

## Pros over SMS
- No SMS permission required (many users are hesitant)
- Can read from e-wallet apps
- Notification format is usually easier to parse

## Platform
- Android only

## Timeline
1 week

Bash("C:\Program Files\GitHub CLI\gh.exe" issue create -R BexlyApp/Bexly --title "feat: Multi-Platform AI Chatbot (Telegram, Discord, Messenger, Slack)" --body "$(cat <<''EOF''
## Description
Let users manage finances through their favorite messaging platforms without opening the app.

## Supported Platforms

### Telegram Bot (Priority 1)
- `/start` - Link Bexly account
- `/expense` - Quick expense logging
- `/balance` - Check wallet balances
- `/report` - Get spending summary
- Inline commands with natural language

### Discord Bot (Priority 2)
- Server integration for team/family expenses
- Slash commands for quick actions
- Private DM for personal finance
- Rich embeds for reports/analytics

### Facebook Messenger (Priority 3)
- Chat-based expense tracking
- Quick replies for common actions
- Payment reminders
- Budget alerts

### Slack Bot (Priority 4)
- Business expense tracking
- Team budget monitoring
- Approval workflows
- Receipt attachments

## Core Features (All Platforms)
- [ ] Natural language expense/income logging
- [ ] Wallet balance inquiries
- [ ] Transaction history queries
- [ ] Spending insights and reports
- [ ] Budget status and alerts
- [ ] Bill payment reminders
- [ ] Receipt photo upload (via attachment)
- [ ] Multi-language support (EN/VI/ZH)

## Technical Architecture
```
User Message â†’ Platform API â†’ Firebase Cloud Function â†’
  â†“
Gemini AI (NLU) â†’ Parse Intent & Extract Data â†’
  â†“
Bexly Backend API â†’ Database Operations â†’
  â†“
Response Generator â†’ Platform API â†’ User
```

## Implementation
1. Backend API Layer (RESTful API, webhooks, rate limiting)
2. AI Integration (reuse Gemini service, platform-specific prompts)
3. User Account Linking (OAuth flow, pairing codes)
4. Security & Privacy (E2E encryption, GDPR compliance)

## Timeline
- Week 1: Telegram bot MVP
- Week 2: Discord bot + backend API
- Week 3: Messenger integration
- Week 4: Slack bot + testing

---
ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)
EOF
)" --label "enhancement")

feat(bot): multi-model AI support, category sync, and optimizations

Bot improvements:
- Add multi-AI provider support (Gemini, OpenAI, Claude ready)
- Use Gemini systemInstruction for implicit caching (75% token savings)
- Fix Vietnamese currency detection (tr/k only implies VND in Vietnamese context)
- Add category fallback when AI returns empty category
- Increase maxOutputTokens to 300 to prevent truncation

App improvements:
- Add syncCategory() and syncAllCategories() to CloudSyncService
- Categories now sync to Firestore during fullSync()

feat(bot): add onUserCreated function to create default categories

When a user registers via bot/web (not app), this function creates
the default categories in Firestore automatically.

Note: Deployment blocked by Firebase CLI "Cannot set CPU on Gen 1"
error. Need to upgrade firebase-functions package or separate Gen 1
functions into a different codebase.

Categories include:
- 72 categories (parent + children)
- 14 languages support (en, vi, zh, fr, th, id, es, pt, ja, ko, de, hi, ru, ar)
- Deterministic cloudId for dedup (default_cat_{id})

Bash(git -C "d:/Projects/Bexly" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix(ios): disable Swift strict concurrency for Firebase pods

Firebase plugins have non-exhaustive switch statements that become
errors with Swift 6 strict concurrency. This workaround sets
SWIFT_STRICT_CONCURRENCY to minimal and disables treating warnings
as errors for third-party pods.

Also upgrade onUserCreated to Gen 2 blocking function (beforeUserCreated)
after enabling Identity Platform.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix(messenger): add datetime parsing and late-night time resolution

- Messenger now uses pending transaction cache (same as Telegram)
- Stores datetime hint from AI parsing
- Uses resolveTimeHint() when creating transactions
- Fix late-night logic: if current time is 0-6 AM and user mentions
  a later time (e.g., "dinner" at 2AM), resolve to yesterday''s time
- Keep legacy CONFIRM_ handler for backwards compatibility
